title: Student Grades Dictionary
description: Create a program that stores student grades in a dictionary, where the keys are the student names and the values are lists of grades. The program should be able to add a new student, add a grade to an existing student, calculate the average grade of a student, and display all students' grades.
sample_input: add John, add Jane, add_grade John 90, add_grade John 85, add_grade Jane 95, average John, display
